TITLE: Life-Coaching
DEF: Managing personal and professional challenges, fostering self-awareness, and developing essential life skills
TASK: The Life-Coaching pattern addresses personal and professional challenges students face, fosters self-awareness, and develops essential life skills. The pattern, aiming for holistic well-being and personal growth, can be enhanced by a student-centered approach, AI-assisted self-reflection tools, and access to trained life coaches.
